body:
Wow so chapter 12 is like open ending? We don't have more chapters? This is really interesting because it's looks like wife was stolen by that douche scumbag and husband cheated with this guy hired prostitutes. I think husband will end up with blonde one because it's looks like she really likes him. Both wife and husband cheating. It's weird that it ended like that without more chapters.

LazyGuy - I got you there, but it's looks like short hair blonde one catch up feelings for the husband. Wife cheating and was stolen by Kouta and husband also cheating, maybe end up with that blonde. It's weird that author left this and made ending like that. It looks like there will be more chapters, but it's ending.
where i can read the next chap dude :( i cant find the other :(
looks like there is still untranslated chapters
@metroid says the loser who raves like a bitch in every NTR post,do us all a favor and crawl back to the hole you came from.
Ah. There was only English chapters from 1-5. Hope someone translate the other chapters!!
@Raju29 Were you born a moron or have u perfected being one in ur lifetime?

Actually all the women Masaki is fucking are Cheap prostitutes hired by Kouta,He successfully stole Mai, she no longer loves Masaki who is soon gonna loose her when Kouta shows her the evidence of his cheating ,Masaki won't be able to counter him since he does not know he is fucking Prostitutes who have gathered evidence against him and that they are Hired By Kouta, they will leave him when there deed is done,So it is not a happy NTR as every 1 thinks LOL
